description: New Anchor Strategies for Evolutionary Neural Network Training

commands.name: Adaptive Learning Rate Anchor (ALA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor ala --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --improvement_factor 1.5 --decay_factor 0.7

commands.name: Momentum-Based Anchor (MBA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor mba --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --momentum 0.95

commands.name: Multi-Scale Anchor (MSA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor msa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant

commands.name: Performance-Weighted Anchor (PWA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor pwa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --performance_weight 1.2

commands.name: Hierarchical Anchor (HA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor ha --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --momentum 0.9

commands.name: Adaptive Learning Rate Anchor (ALA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor ala --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine --improvement_factor 1.3 --decay_factor 0.8

commands.name: Momentum-Based Anchor (MBA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor mba --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine --momentum 0.9

commands.name: Multi-Scale Anchor (MSA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor msa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine

commands.name: Performance-Weighted Anchor (PWA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor pwa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine --performance_weight 1.1

commands.name: Hierarchical Anchor (HA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor ha --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine --momentum 0.9

commands.name: Comparison: Fixed vs ALA vs MBA - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 30 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor fixed --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant

commands.name: Comparison: Fixed vs ALA vs MBA - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 30 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor ala --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --improvement_factor 1.2 --decay_factor 0.8

commands.name: Comparison: Fixed vs ALA vs MBA - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 30 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor mba --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --momentum 0.9

commands.name: Ensemble Anchor (EA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor ea --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --ensemble_size 3

commands.name: Uncertainty-Aware Anchor (UAA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor uaa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant

commands.name: Adaptive Proposing Space (APS) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor aps --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --max_d_ratio 2.0 --min_d_ratio 0.5

commands.name: Multi-Objective Anchor (MOA) - CIFAR10, LeNet, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch lenet --optimizer CMA_ES --d 128 --criterion ce --inner_steps 1 --epochs 50 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor moa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler constant --objective_weights 0.7,0.3

commands.name: Ensemble Anchor (EA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor ea --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine --ensemble_size 5

commands.name: Uncertainty-Aware Anchor (UAA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor uaa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine

commands.name: Adaptive Proposing Space (APS) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor aps --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine --max_d_ratio 1.5 --min_d_ratio 0.7

commands.name: Multi-Objective Anchor (MOA) - CIFAR10, ResNet32, CMA_ES
commands.command: python es_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --arch resnet32 --optimizer CMA_ES --d 256 --criterion ce --inner_steps 2 --epochs 100 --ws randproj --normalize_projection --es_std 0.1 --anchor moa --lr 1.0 --lr_scheduler cosine --objective_weights 0.8,0.2
